The Pony Music Archive

About

The Pony fandom has produced an amazing amount of music of all kinds, welcome to its largest, organized, high-quality music archive! For the March 2019 release we have tens of thousands of tracks from 3000 artists, and over 100 albums.

Consider this a spiritual successor to the MLP Music Archive, but actively maintained and gathering songs from the best public and private sources available.

The Raw archive is massive, with over 500 GB of single tracks plus 100 GB of albums. You'll find both brand new tracks, and old forgotten ones that few people still have.

Download

The High Quality version is recommended if you just want to listen.
It's designed so that you shouldn't hear the difference with the Raw version.
If you're short on space, Phone Quality is very compact and still sounds fine.
